sentences.english: In addition, soil fertility was improved along with the increment of fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施肥後效和土壤肥力均隨施肥量的增加而提高。

sentences.english: We have a nice mock up design in flash and aftereffect.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個不錯的閃光燈和後效模擬了設計。

sentences.english: Market demand has the Markov character, so Markov method is suitable to be applied to analyze the market demand.
sentences.chinese: 市場需求具有無後效性，符合馬爾柯夫法應用條件。

sentences.english: And even that will have a delayed effect.
sentences.chinese: 即使如此也有滯後效應。

sentences.english: I need an animation on my logo using aftereffect and flash.
sentences.chinese: 我需要對我的使用後效和閃光的標誌動畫。
